Abstractions

Use the display selector on the right hand side to switch between form style types. These abstractions are controlled via a form-* class on the <form> element. For example block style forms would have a .form-block class.

You can test the jQuery Form Validation script by trying to submit the form without any values. This page can also be saved as a .php file and tested with the included PHP Mailer script.
